item.title: Germany - Wikipedia
item.description: Germany is a developed country with a strong economy; it has the largest economy in Europe by nominal GDP. As a major force in several industrial, scientific and technological sectors, Germany is both the world's third-largest exporter and third-largest importer.

item.title: Germany | Facts, Geography, Maps, & History | Britannica
item.description: Although Germany existed as a loose polity of Germanic-speaking peoples for millennia, a united German nation in roughly its present form dates only to 1871. Modern Germany is a liberal democracy that has become ever more integrated with and central to a united Europe.

item.title: Germany | Culture, Facts & Travel | - CountryReports
item.description: Germany in depth country profile. Unique hard to find content on Germany. Includes customs, culture, history, geography, economy current events, photos, video, and more.

item.title: Facts about Germany - deutschland.de
item.description: Germany is a parliamentary democracy with its Basic Law serving as the constitutional foundation. Germany is a federation comprising 16 federal states. Who governs in Germany? The federal president is the head of state, an office that has been held by Frank-Walter Steinmeier since 2017.

item.title: Information on Germany - Germany Travel
item.description: You will find everything you ever wanted to know about Germany in our summary of key facts and figures, from form of government to size, landscapes, population, lifestyle and cultural scene.

item.title: Facts about Germany - Federal Foreign Office
item.description: It provides facts and figures about Germany's people, system of government, social life, politics, economy and culture. The website breaks down information into topics, with details such as charts, statistics and other related facts located in each section.

item.title: Germany Maps & Facts - World Atlas
item.description: Physical map of Germany showing major cities, terrain, national parks, rivers, and surrounding countries with international borders and outline maps. Key facts about Germany.

item.title: Germany - New World Encyclopedia
item.description: Germany, officially the Federal Republic of Germany, a country in Central Europe, is a modern great power, the world's third largest economy, and the world's largest exporter of goods.

item.title: Seite-Topic-Auf einen Blick | Facts about Germany
item.description: Germany at a glance The Federal Republic of Germany is situated in the heart of Europe. It is a cosmopolitan, democratic country with a rich heritage and a thriving present-day. Facts and figures at a glance.

item.title: Welcome to Germany
item.description: Explore Germany's rich history, diverse geography, vibrant culture, and dynamic economy in this comprehensive guide.
